Sphinx RST Guide

RST Cheet Sheet

PHP Domain (Class)

class DateTimeÔÉÅ

Datetime class

setDate($year, $month, $day)ÔÉÅ

Set the date.

Parameters

  • $year (int) ‚Äì The year.

  • $month (int) ‚Äì The month.

  • $day (int) ‚Äì The day.

Returns

Either false on failure, or the datetime object for method chaining.

setTime($hour, $minute[, $second])ÔÉÅ

Set the time.

Parameters

  • $hour (int) ‚Äì The hour

  • $minute (int) ‚Äì The minute

  • $second (int) ‚Äì The second

Returns

Either false on failure, or the datetime object for method chaining.

constant ATOMÔÉÅ

Y-m-dTH:i:sP

GlossaryÔÉÅ

environmentÔÉÅ

A structure where information about all documents under the root is saved, and used for cross-referencing. The environment is pickled after the parsing stage, so that successive runs only need to read and parse new and changed documents.

source directoryÔÉÅ

The directory which, including its subdirectories, contains all source files for one Sphinx project.

SeealsoÔÉÅ

See also

GNU tar manual, Basic Tar Format

Documentation for tar archive files, including GNU tar extensions.
